General.Name: Lion Financial Group Limited
General.Description: Lion Group Holding Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates trading platform in Hong Kong. The company's trading platform offers range of products and services, including contract-for-difference trading, insurance agency, futures and securities brokerage, and asset management services for investors and institutional clients. Lion Group Holding Ltd. is headquartered in Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong.
General.Address: RM F, 22/F, Kowloon Bay, Hong Kong, 999077
